title: Mark Warner announces Ben Roseveare as new head of sales
text:
Mark Warner has appointed Ben Roseveare as the company’s new head of sales and marketing 
Mark Warner has appointed Ben Roseveare as the company’s new head of sales and marketing 
Roseverare joins Mark Warner from his previous role as marketing director at Intrepid Group. He was also previously sales and marketing director at Exodus Travels. 
He brings with him 15 years’ experience running sales and marketing teams in the active and adventure holiday space. 
Commenting on the appointment, David Hopkins, managing director, said: ”We are really excited that Ben will be joining our team bringing with him his wealth of experience and knowledge of the travel industry. Ben will be heading up the marketing and sales departments with a particular focus on digital marketing and expanding our trade channels.” 
Roseverare added: “Mark Warner is an operator that I have always admired. Summer and winter sports have been a core passion throughout my life, so it’s a real privilege to be asked to come and head up the Mark Warner sales and marketing efforts.I’ve always worked closely with my teams to ensure that travel agents are at the forefront of our promotions and sales strategies. 
“I look forward to ensuring that Mark Warner are genuinely supporting growth with our industry partners and helping our travel agent community to grow their own knowledge, and of course sales.”
